item.description:
Are you going to celebrate completing your NH 48 4000ft highest peak list?

This posting is for information and also maybe we can attend as a group.

Schedule:

  • 4:30-5:30 Social Hour with exhibits by trail maintenance organizations
  • 5:30-6:45 Pizza, coffee and Milk, and cookies ($$ and reservation needed)
  • 6:45-7:00 Outdoor Presentation of canine awards
  • 7:00-8:45 Presentations of Awards in the auditorium
  • 8:45-9:45 Opportunity for informal conversation


Margaritas is at 93 Portsmouth Avenue, Exeter, NH
item.how_to_find_us: send me your cell phone if you don't come to margaritas# Diane 603-477-5116
item.name: Four Thousand Footer Club 2009 annual meeting
